00002 /* Node Stuct -> holds a key value pair */
00003 struct node {
00004     struct node *next;
00005     struct node *prev;
00006     char key[100];
00007     char val[100];
00008 };

00010 /* Linked List Struct -> holds one table (in form of linked list of nodes) and links to   next / previous table */
00011 struct linkedlist {
00012     char name[200];
00013 
00014     struct node *head;
00015     struct node *tail;
00016 
00017     struct linkedlist *next;
00018     struct linkedlist *prev;
00019 };

00021 /* Database Struct -> holds the tables in a form of a linked list */
00022 struct database {
00023     struct linkedlist *head;
00024     struct linkedlist *tail;
00025 };
